titleStmt.title: Praise of the dairy-maid, with a lick at the cream-pot, or fading rose. To the tune of, Packington's pound.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the use of the Milk-Maids on May-day for ever,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
